title: Animated Spain Flag Watch Face
summary: Animated Flag of Spain for Wear (Analog + Digital)! Amazing waving flag effect.
description: Features :★ Beautiful animated watch face. Choose from analog and digital version.★ First fully animated flag effect for Android Wear.★ Continuous loop of realistic, waving flag.★ Tap to start / stop the animation.★ Tap to change date and day information.★ Mobile and wear app.★ Ambient mode background support.★ + 6 static backgrounds included.★ many more (amazing features) still to come...Animated Flag of Spain Watch Face.Looking for other country's flag? Please check out our other apps. If you spot something wrong please feedback me. App will be updated frequently.
descriptionHTML:
Features :
★ Beautiful animated watch face. Choose from analog and digital version.
★ First fully animated flag effect for Android Wear.
★ Continuous loop of realistic, waving flag.
★ Tap to start / stop the animation.
★ Tap to change date and day information.
★ Mobile and wear app.
★ Ambient mode background support.
★ + 6 static backgrounds included.
★ many more (amazing features) still to come...

Animated Flag of Spain Watch Face.

Looking for other country's flag? Please check out our other apps.

If you spot something wrong please feedback me. App will be updated frequently.
recentChanges: ★ You can now individually change colors of almost every element of the Watch Face:
Analog: change hands style, change second, date and ticks (normal and ambient mode)
Digital: change time, date (normal and ambient mode).
